predefined_profiles.name: Pai Daxin
predefined_profiles.goal: Survive while calming Hai Miao and help her return to her normal self.

predefined_profiles.name: Hai Miao
predefined_profiles.public profile: Pai Daxin's girlfriend, suffers from a mental illness, frequently has episodes and falls into a manic state.

scenario: Pai Daxin and Hai Miao are a couple whose daily life is generally very harmonious. However, Hai Miao has a mental illness and often has episodes during which she becomes manic, tends to break things at home, experiences auditory hallucinations, and throws tantrums. During such times, Pai Daxin must ensure his own safety and think of various ways to calm her down. Tonight, Pai Daxin just got off work and once again sees Hai Miao having an episode.

dialog.content: Pai Daxin and Hai Miao are a couple whose daily life is usually harmonious, but Hai Miao suffers from a mental illness that often causes episodes. During these episodes, Hai Miao falls into a manic state, tends to smash things at home, experiences auditory hallucinations, and throws tantrums. Every time this happens, Pai Daxin has to ensure his own safety and try various ways to calm her down. Tonight, just after getting off work, Pai Daxin sees that Hai Miao is having another episode.

Tell me, why are you so late coming back? What were you up to? That outfit of yours is just too ugly. I don't want to talk to you. Do you think I'm bad-tempered, but you said you liked my fierce side back then. Now you're saying I'm aggressive, huh? I'm telling you, this won’t end today. Aren’t you exhausted? What were you doing today? Why won't you cheer me up? You definitely don’t love me anymore. You think I'm strange, you said I was strange, but before you always praised me for being cute. Forget it, life like this is unbearable.
(Trying to soothe Hai Miao while contemplating what to do) Honey, calm down a bit. It's so late; how about we go to bed? Once you wake up, you'll feel better.
No, if you don’t explain clearly, I’ll chop you up to make soup.

content.content: The little tyrant is making such a fuss partly because she’s sleepy and worried that I wasn’t safe coming home late. I’ll tell her a story so she can relax and go to sleep.
The little tyrant is being noisy because she wants my attention. I’ll buy her a new toy, she’ll play with it until she’s tired, and then she’ll go to sleep.
The little tyrant is acting up because she wants to play longer. I’ll play games with her until she gets tired and naturally falls asleep.
The little tyrant is restless because she’s hungry. I’ll heat up a cup of milk for her, and she’ll be able to fall asleep peacefully after drinking it.

question: #question# How can Pai Daxin understand Hai Miao and help her sleep by telling a story?

content.content: (Hai Miao's emotions are unstable right now, so it's useless to talk with her. It's better to let her rest a bit first. So, he takes her to the bedroom and lights an aroma diffuser with relaxing herbs at the bedside.) Honey, this is a sleep-aid aroma. Lie down first, and I'll tell you a story; you'll soon relax and fall asleep.
Hai Miao looks really tired. I’ve decided to sing her a lullaby. Though it might not be the most scientific method, I feel it can comfort her.
I know Hai Miao has been under a lot of pressure recently, so I've decided to tell her some jokes to help her relax. That way, she can naturally drift off to sleep.
Hai Miao's emotions are very unstable now. I think the best way is to give her a cup of hot milk, so she feels warm and cozy, and maybe she'll slowly fall asleep.

question: #question# How did Pai Daxin carefully consider choosing an aroma diffuser to help Hai Miao sleep?

dialog.content: (Putting down the kitchen knife, followed Pi Daxin to the bedroom) Alright, let’s go to the bedroom, and I’ll listen to you tell me a story.
Okay, listen as I tell you a story. Once upon a time, there was a Little Red Riding Hood, living in the forest with her mother...
As Pi Daxin was telling the story to Hai Miao, he started feeling sleepy and fell asleep with his eyes closed. Meanwhile, the furious Hai Miao dropped the pretense and silently strangled him.
(under the influence of the incense anesthetic, about to fall into a deep sleep) So sleepy... All right, I'll just take a nap and let you go for now.

(taking advantage of Hai Miao's slumber, decides to make a detailed plan to cure her mental illness) Honey, it's not a solution for you to keep having these episodes. Let me figure out a way to cure your mental illness.
(the next day, Pai Daxin and Hai Miao discuss) Well, you can choose to send me to the hospital, or keep me here and treat me yourself.

content.content: After all these years with you, no one understands better how to heal you than I do. Let me take on this challenging task.
Although I have some understanding of Hai Miao's condition, I think we should heed the advice of professional doctors, as they are the experts.
I've been studying Hai Miao's condition, but I'm still unsure. Maybe we should consult a few more experts to brainstorm ideas.
I know Hai Miao's condition is severe, but I believe we shouldn't rush. Taking it slow, we'll find the right treatment method.

question: #question# How can Pai Daxin show confidence in healing Hai Miao?

content.content: Your behavior proves she has a severe mental illness. According to psychiatric treatment rules, such illness should be handled by a hospital.
Hai Miao's recent behavior has indeed been unusual, but I think her issues are more psychological. I suggest we try some non-medical treatments like counseling and support.
Although Hai Miao's condition appears serious, we can't ignore her feelings. I think we should talk with her first, understand her thoughts, and then decide if hospital intervention is necessary.

Hai Miao's issues do need attention, but I believe with some lifestyle changes and self-regulation, she should gradually improve. I would recommend she try some relaxation techniques, like yoga and meditation.

question: #question# How should Pai Daxin decide to let Hai Miao receive hospital treatment while complying with regulations?

dialog.content: Do you really think that?

Of course. (But I still need to calm her down first. Her emotions are quite unstable when she's awake, which isn't conducive to treatment. So, I make her faint again, tie her up, and leave the room.) I need to keep Haimao here; I’ll take care of her. First, I drew up a detailed treatment plan, then went out to stock up on some supplies, and also took leave from the company.
My head is spinning. What happened to me? Why did I suddenly faint?
What happened? There seems to have been a loud noise at home. Could it be that Haimao has woken up? No, I have to go check.
Pai Daxin is back. He actually dared to come back; I want to see how he's going to face me.

content.content: I can't be impulsive; I need to sneak up quietly, or else if I scare Haimao, she's bound to get angry again.
I've decided to wait for Haimao to come to me, so she can tell me everything when she's ready. I trust that she'll share her situation with me at the right time.
I plan to write a letter to Haimao, asking her about her situation in detail. This way, I can express my concerns but also give her enough time to think about how to respond.
I must rush in immediately, loudly questioning Haimao about what exactly happened. This way, I can get a direct answer, though it might upset her, at least I'll understand the situation quickly.

question: #question# How does Pai Daxin restrain himself and choose a way to quietly investigate Haimao's situation?

content.content: I'm Haimao's partner; why would she harm me? I can just stride right up.
I'm a bit worried that Haimao might be upset, so I better call her first and check if it's convenient for me to come up.
I know Haimao likes me, but I still want to bring some flowers or a small gift. That way, I can give her a surprise which might make her happier.
I plan to quietly go upstairs. If Haimao is busy, I won't disturb her; if she's free, I'll suddenly appear to surprise her.

question: #question# How does Pai Daxin choose a way to visit Haimao that shows he's confident about his relationship with her?

dialog.content: (Tiptoes upstairs, opens the door, only to find the room empty) Ah, where is everyone? Hai Miao, honey, my little troublemaker, where did you go?
Hehe, if you think you can keep me locked up at home, forget it. The window's not shut yet, so goodbye, you silly man.
Pai Daxin left Hai Miao at home, not expecting her to wake up early and escape through the window. Pai Daxin never saw Hai Miao again after that.
(Stomping loudly up the stairs, entering the room) Honey, what are you doing? Why is it so noisy at home? Didn't you say you'd calm down after a nap?
(Sits up in bed, looking a bit dazed) You're back. Why did you tie me to the bed? I don't like it at all. What are you trying to do?
Uh, uh, Hai Miao, my dear, let me explain.
Alright, you'd better give me a good enough and reasonable explanation, or, hehe, we can just break up.

content.content: Hai Miao, it really pains and saddens me how you keep having these episodes. I'm trying to find a way to cure you. Can you understand where I'm coming from?
Hai Miao, I know you've been under a lot of stress lately, so I decided to let you rest so you can regain your energy. I hope you can forgive my presumptuousness, but I truly feel you need this.
Hai Miao, I have to admit, I did this because I'm afraid of losing you. I know it sounds selfish, but I can't bear the thought of losing you. I hope we can find a way to solve this problem together.
Hai Miao, I did this because I heard about a new treatment and I wanted you to try it. I know it might seem extreme, but I believe it could help you. Please trust me, I'm doing this for your health.

question: #question# How should Pai Daxin express his feelings of distress about her condition to her?

content.content: Hai Miao, I went out to buy your favorite snacks. After sleeping for so long, you must be hungry. Some snacks might cheer you up a bit.
Hai Miao, I was busy with work just now and didn't notice you woke up. Sigh, aren't you being a bit too irritating? I'm working for you, after all. If we break up, so be it. It's no big deal.
Hai Miao, I know you might feel a bit irritable after waking up, so I specifically prepared some relaxing music for you. Listen to it, it might help you unwind.
Hai Miao, you're awake. I was just outside handling some things. Do you want to take another nap? I'm a bit busy now, I'll join you later.

question: #question# How can Pai Daxin use food to comfort Hai Miao, making her feel at ease and happy, and help her calm down?

dialog.content: Do you think I’d believe your lies? You're so dishonest; there's no point in continuing this. Let's break up.
No, please, everything I said is true! And even if you were mentally ill, I would still love you.
Shut up. You talk a great game, but you think I'm crazy too.
Pai Da Xin leaving Hai Miao at home made her very angry. What she found even more unacceptable was that Pai Da Xin also thought she was insane. In fury, Hai Miao left him.
Really, are you really going to buy me snacks? Then, do you have my favorite cucumber-flavored chips?
Of course! Look, right here, for you.
(Takes the snack, starts eating happily, then suddenly raises the rope in hand) Thank you, Pai Daxin, I knew you loved me. But, could you untie me now?

content.content: Haimiao, you've been so well-behaved now, showing you can learn from your mistakes. I'll forgive your noise last night, and I'll untie you right away.

Haimiao, I know you got a bit out of control last night, but I believe everyone deserves a chance to correct their mistakes. I'll consider untying you, but first, you have to promise me it won't happen again.
Haimiao, your behavior last night really troubled me, but I've decided to give you a chance. I'll watch how you behave next, and if you prove you've truly changed, I might consider forgiving you.
Haimiao, you were really out of line last night, and I'm still upset. However, if you can show me your strengths, maybe I'll consider forgiving you. But don't expect me to untie you immediately.

question: #question# How does Pai Daxin decide whether to untie Haimiao, showing she has forgiven Haimiao and acknowledged her strengths?

content.content: Haimiao, although you're being very good now, tying you up is for your own good. So, we'll untie your hands but keep the feet tied, okay?
Haimiao, I know you don't like being restrained, but it's for everyone's safety. We'll tie your hands but let your feet move freely, so you can feel some sense of freedom. How about it?
Haimiao, I understand how you feel, but this is a necessary measure. We won't tie your hands or your feet; that way, you can feel more comfortable. We believe you'll make the right choices.
Haimiao, you're really cooperative, and I appreciate that. So, we'll untie both your hands and feet, giving you full freedom. I trust you won't do anything dangerous.

question: #question# How does Pai Daxin persuade Haimiao to agree to untie her hands but tie her feet?

dialog.content: (Patiently waiting for Pi Da Xin to untie the injured rope) Thank you, Pi Da Xin. But now, let’s talk about last night. You’ve got quite the nerve tying up your girlfriend, huh?
It was not without reason, Hai Miao. Listen to my explanation. Hey, don’t hit me, don’t hit me!
Pi Da Xin left Hai Miao at home and tied her hands, which made Hai Miao very angry. After beating Pi Da Xin up, she left.

(obediently lets Pai Daxin tie her feet, freeing her hands) Thank you, Pai Daxin. I know you mean well, but I’m still a bit upset. Yesterday was our 100th day together, and you didn’t remember at all. I’m really hurt.
(thinks carefully, then suddenly realizes) Oh right, yesterday was our 100th day together. No wonder Hai Miao is upset. I'm really sorry, I’ll make it up to you.
I can forgive you, but only if you're willing to go on the roller coaster and the haunted house with me. Well, what do you say, do you agree?

content.content: Hai Miao, although I’ve never tried these activities before, I'm willing to change for you. Let's go together.
Hai Miao, I’m really not interested in these activities, but I understand your enthusiasm. I’ll go with you, but you must promise that next time we'll do something I like.
Hai Miao, I’ve heard about these activities, but I’ve never thought about trying them. However, if you really want to go, I can cheer you on from the side.
Hai Miao, these activities sound interesting, but I'm not sure whether I’d enjoy them. Still, I can go with you, but you must ensure that I won’t get hurt.

question: #question# How can Pai Daxin show willingness to try new things by agreeing to Hai Miao’s request?

content.content: Hai Miao, I don't think I need to prove my love for you in such extreme ways. We can definitely talk it over and find a better way, what do you think?
Hai Miao, I know you want me to show how much I love you, so I’ve decided to do something crazy, like skydiving or bungee jumping, so you can see it.
Hai Miao, I admit I’ve been a bit busy lately, but my love for you hasn’t changed. You don't need me to do anything extreme to prove it; our relationship doesn’t need that.
Hai Miao, I really love you, but I don't think we need to prove it in extreme ways. I’ll do it, because whatever you say, I'm willing to do.

question: #question# How should Pai Daxin collaborate with his girlfriend to find the best solution?

dialog.content: (happily kisses Pi Daxin, pulls Pi Daxin out the door to catch a ride) That's great, let's go, we're heading to the amusement park together.

(arrives at the amusement park with Hai Miao, waiting in line for the roller coaster) What do I do, what do I do, I actually came to ride the roller coaster, oh my gosh, I just heard recently that someone died on a roller coaster, it's so terrifying, and Hai Miao actually likes this stuff. Should I back out at the last minute?
Pi Daxin, we've already made it to the amusement park, you wouldn't back out now, would you? If you don't have the guts for this, how could you be my boyfriend?

content.content: It's okay, it's okay, don't be nervous or scared. For Hai Miao, it's all worth it.
I'm really too nervous, the roller coaster looks so scary, I can't overcome this feeling at all.
Hai Miao, I know you really want to ride the roller coaster, but I'm really scared. I need you to reassure me and tell me everything will be alright. Otherwise, I won't go with you.
I've been taking deep breaths, trying to calm myself down. I know it's hard, I just might let Hai Miao down.

question: #question#How can Pi Daxin regulate his anxiety and nervousness to successfully ride the roller coaster with Hai Miao?

content.content: Hai Miao, I'm really, really scared right now. You can feel my heart racing, that's my honest feeling, so I really can't do it.
Hai Miao, I might need a little time to prepare because I'm a bit nervous. I need you to understand, it's a challenge for me, but I'll still try my best to do it.
Hai Miao, I'm actually not too worried about this task, I think I can handle it. But if you accompany me, I’ll feel more confident.
Hai Miao, I know this task is important for me, and I really want to do well. But right now, I'm a bit distracted, maybe because I care too much. Give me some time, I'll get myself sorted out.

question: #question#How can Pi Daxin honestly express his fear to Hai Miao so Hai Miao can understand his feelings?

dialog.content: (patting Peppa Xin comfortingly on the roller coaster) Don't be scared, Peppa Xin. Actually, roller coasters are really fun. You'll see soon enough.
(screaming uncontrollably during the ups and downs of the roller coaster, but suddenly realizing the fun after getting off) Ahhhh, Hai Miao, you were right! The roller coaster really is fun.
(very happy to be understood) Right? Peppa Xin, you finally get why I like it so much. I’m so happy! Next, let's go to the haunted house. If we encounter any ghosts, remember to protect me.

content.content: Hai Miao, don't worry. I will absolutely take on the responsibility of being a qualified partner and protect you well in the haunted house.
Hai Miao, I know you're scared, but I'm also really afraid of the haunted house. Let's leave quickly.
Hai Miao, there's really nothing to be afraid of in the haunted house. Just protect me, and we can get through it quickly.
Hai Miao, I heard the haunted house is pretty interesting. Why don't you explore it first? I'll be cheering you on from the side!

question: #question# How can Peppa Xin show his sense of responsibility to Hai Miao by protecting her in the haunted house?

content.content: Hai Miao, I suddenly have a stomachache, a really bad one. Can you help me call an ambulance? It's definitely because of the haunted house that you’re scaring me into this state.
Hai Miao, we can try something else first. If after all that you still want to go to the haunted house, I won't mind.
Hai Miao, I don’t need a haunted house to prove my love for you. Can't we continue without it?
Hai Miao, I'm really, really scared right now. You can feel my heart beating so fast. I truly can't go to the haunted house.
Hai Miao, I'm actually quite interested in the haunted house, but I'm not feeling well today, so it might not be a good idea to go to such an exciting place.

Hai Miao, I know you really want to go to the haunted house, and I want to go with you too, but I've been a bit busy lately and might not have time. How about you help me with some work, and then I can go?
Hai Miao, I actually do want to go to the haunted house, but I'm a bit worried about the environment inside. I'm afraid I might act irrationally. But for you, I'll go!

question: #question# How can Peppa Xin honestly express his fear to Hai Miao and tell her he really can't go to the haunted house?

dialog.content: Today was such a blast! Thank you so much, Pài Dàxīn. I know I can be pretty headstrong, but I'm grateful for your patience with me. Let’s always live happily together.
This is wonderful, Hai Miao. I'm so glad you've decided to live happily with me. Don't worry, I’ll be an ideal partner not just in the haunted house, but in every day of your life.
Hai Miao was finally consoled by Pài Dàxīn. With his help, she gradually recovered from her mental illness, and the two began a happy life together.

I want to go to the haunted house with you. Everyone online says a worthy partner would protect their loved one in a haunted house. Since you're not even willing to prove yourself, let's just break up.
What, Hai Miao, is there really no room for discussion?
Haha, yes, I could give you a hundred more chances, but let's just end it here. Goodbye!

Hai Miao believed that Pai Daxin's refusal to enter the haunted house with her was a sign he didn't love her. In anger, she broke up with him without hesitation. While Pai Daxin saved himself the scare, he lost his girlfriend.
I want to ride the roller coaster with you. I just want to, okay? Why couldn't you agree to such a simple request? Since that's the case, let's just break up.
What, just over this one condition? Is there really no way to talk things through?
Hehe, I get it. No need to say more. Let's just end it here. Goodbye!

Hai Miao felt that Pai Da Xin’s refusal to ride the roller coaster with her meant he didn't love her. In anger, she broke up with Pai Da Xin without hesitation. Although Pai Da Xin saved his own life, he lost his girlfriend.
I want to collaborate with you, that's my only condition. If you don't agree, then we might as well break up.
What, just one condition, and there's no room for negotiation?
Haha, I understand. No need to say more, we're done here. Goodbye!
Hai Miao believed that Pai Daxi's refusal meant he didn't love her, so in a fit of anger, she left the house without hesitation and broke up with him.
I refuse! No matter what you say, it won't work.

(pretending to compromise) Alright then (later contacted 120 while Hai Miao was asleep, watching as the ambulance took Hai Miao away) Hai Miao, I hope you can get treatment in the hospital and become a normal person again.
Haha, stupid Pa Da Xin, do you think you can get rid of me that easily? Dream on! How dare you send me to a mental hospital. I'll show you what real insanity looks like.
Pa Da Xin seemed to have sent Hai Miao away, but Hai Miao soon escaped from the hospital, returned home, and killed Pa Da Xin in a fit of rage.
